name: oj-rgbu-jraf-toaster
description: A container to display and manage a set of toast messages (oj-rgbu-jraf-toast).

maximum.description: The maximum number of toasts to display at once. Additional toasts are queued for display.

openToast.description: Method to queue a new toast message.

params.name: toastConfig
params.description: The toast configuration (see JSDoc for details)
